mapper.sql: id, email, passworld, uername, role, status, regTime, regIp
mapper.select: select ID, EMAIL, PASSWORLD, UERNAME, ROLE, STATUS, REGTIME, REGIP from userftx where UERNAME = #{value}
select ID, EMAIL, PASSWORLD, UERNAME, ROLE, STATUS, REGTIME, REGIP from userftx where id = #{value}
mapper.insert: insert into userftx (id, email, passworld, uername, role, status, regTime, regIp) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{passworld,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{role,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{regtime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{regip,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into userftx
id,
email,
passworld,
uername,
role,
status,
regTime,
regIp,

mapper.update:
update userftx
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
passworld = #{passworld,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
uername = #{uername,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
role = #{role,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
regTime = #{regtime,jdbcType=DATE},
regIp = #{regip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update userftx set email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, passworld = #{passworld,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, uername = #{uername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, role = #{role,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, regTime = #{regtime,jdbcType=DATE}, regIp = #{regip,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
